synopsis.text:
Devil King or high priest? The future of Akuto Sai hangs in the balance as he steps into the hallowed halls of Constant Magic Academy. With dreams of becoming a beacon of hope and change, Akuto finds himself entangled in a prophecy that foretells his destiny as the Demon King. As word spreads, his classmates grow wary, and even his closest ally, the noble ninja Junko Hattori, begins to question his intentions.

But Akuto is not alone in his struggle. Enigmatic girls with their own agendas surround him, from the mysterious Keena Soga, who seems to have a peculiar fascination with him, to the mesmerizing android Korone, who is programmed to protect and seduce him.

As Akuto's powers awaken, he must navigate the treacherous waters of magical high school life, battling monsters, bullies, and the occasional temptation. With his fate seemingly sealed, can Akuto defy the odds and prove that he is more than just a prophesied Demon King? Or will he succumb to the pressures of his newfound powers and the whirlwind of girl trouble that threatens to consume him? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of magic, destiny, and the power of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
